issue.title: [Plasma] enable Subscribe and GetNotification from Java
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5406](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5406). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, these functions exist in the cpp API, but are not exposed via JNI.

If this is a feature that is in line with the project direction, I would be happy to implement it.
